name: YouChooseSpaceExploration
0:
”Alexa, open Space Exploration”
”Alexa, play Space Exploration”
”Alexa, open Space Exploration and go to the Story Menu”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: space exploration
Developer Terms of Use
des: YOU CHOOSE: SPACE EXPLORATION is a You Choose bundle from Capstone, powered by Earplay. This bundle features five action-packed, interactive stories, including The Race to the Moon, Apollo 11 Moon Landing, International Space Station, Mars Exploration Rovers, and Race to the Stars. With simple voice commands, put yourself behind the controls and get ready for liftoff with this hands-on space exploration adventure. With multiple endings, this You Choose bundle is a truly dynamic experience. The first story, The Race to the Moon is available to all users with the additional stories available with purchase or Kids+ subscription.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
